name: Mumu's Crew
description:
Curated by mumu_thestan as her entry in to the first #VesselsGen0 Crew competition,  An edition of this artwork commemorating Mumu's winning crew was issued to all those who entered the competition.

A crew of fashionable teenagers who infiltrate elite society in the colony, and fight for the rights of the oppressed and the abused.

Haritsam with the green armour helmet and Omni Nibbler familiar is the fighter, who stays anonymous. No one knows what she looks like.

Engaos is well respected in the colony, and champions the downtrodden. No one dares cross him.

Kawachi had been assaulted in the alleys of the colony before, but those who assaulted did not live to see another day. She is a fierce fighter who got her cyborg body after the attack.

Schmitt is the witch of the crew. She lays low and stays hidden most of the time. She is able to telepathically communicate with the rest of the crew, and see through the eyes of her Pigmy Hooter familiar.

Fynida seems like a regular elite teenager who loves fun things like bunnies and tacos. But she hides a dark secret, a dark past, that has made her set on rebelling against the Queen.
